    @allure.feature("用户认证模块")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("case", CASES)
    def test_user_auth(case, auth_token, small_jpg_image, large_jpg_image, small_png_image, large_png_image, non_image_file):
        allure.story(case["name"])
        allure.title(case["case_id"] + ": " + case["name"])
    
        # 文件映射
        file_map = {
            "test_avatar.jpg": small_jpg_image,
            "large_avatar.jpg": large_jpg_image,
            "test_avatar.png": small_png_image,
            "large_avatar.png": large_png_image,
            "test_file.txt": non_image_file
        }
        # 预处理请求
        request_data = preprocess_request(case, auth_token, file_map)
    
        # 测试用例：未登录状态上传头像
        if case["case_id"] == "auth_029":
            # 移除token，模拟未登录
            response = Request.send_request(
                method=case["method"],
                endpoint=case["url"],
                files=request_data.get("files"),
                token=None  # 显式传None，不携带token
            )
        else:
            # 发送请求
            response = Request.send_request(
                method=case["method"],
                endpoint=case["url"],
                json=request_data.get("json"),
                params=request_data.get("params"),
                headers=request_data.get("headers"),
                files=request_data.get("files"),
                token=auth_token
            )
    
        # 断言
>       assert_response(
            response,
            expected_code=case["expected_code"],
            expected_success=case.get("expected_success"),
            expected_message=case.get("expected_message")
        )
